attributes.action: Halt the fluoridation of Britain's water supply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely we all have a basic right to decide what we do or don't put into our bodies? Therefore, we'd like to ask that the government calls a halt to the practice of pumping Fluoride - a substance that has been linked to malfunctioning of the Thyroid gland and Dental Fluorosis (pitting of the teeth), and which is commonly sourced from industrial by-products - into Britain's water supply. The type of fluoride used has been classified as a "Part II poison" - even the instructions on tubes of toothpaste warn against using too much. Proponents of Fluoridation argue that it may be good for your teeth, but if Fluoride has any beneficial effect on the body at all, then logically it must be a "medicine". I personally find the idea of Mass-Medication through our water supply deeply disturbing...!
